Content_FullWidth.Name: Presidents QA
Content_FullWidth.Title: President's Q&A
Content_FullWidth.BodyCopy:
New President's Executive Group Q&A Schedule

Employee Q&A

A new schedule has been created for the employee Q&A sessions with President Clark and the vice presidents. Instead of rotating between 7 a.m., noon, and 5 p.m. start times, all Q&As will be held during the noon hour in the MC Special Events Room. Submitting questions in advance is no longer required. The following Q&A sessions are for employees only. The President holds seperate Q&A sessions for students.

2014 Schedule:

January 10 Friday Noon MC Special Events Room
February 13 Thursday Noon MC Special Events Room
March 14 Friday Noon MC Special Events Room
April 10 Thursday Noon MC Little Theater
May 7 Wednesday Noon MC Special Events Room
June 5 Thursday Noon MC Special Events Room
July 18 Friday Noon MC Special Events Room
August 21 Thursday Noon MC Special Events Room
September 17 Wednesday Noon MC Special Events Room
October 23 Thursday Noon MC Special Events Room
November 21 Friday Noon MC Special Events Room
December 11 Thursday Noon MC Special Events Room
